body_html:
Any update on this issue? I've exact same issue and build_all_android.sh never completes. I've tried changing NDK versions, tweaking some parts of the makefile, but this still persists.

Not really sure where is the root of the problem at all, or how to even start figuring out if the problem is due to Makefile, or the script to build or something else entirely?

body:
Any update on this issue? I've exact same issue and `build_all_android.sh` never completes. I've tried changing NDK versions, tweaking some parts of the makefile, but this still persists.

Not really sure where is the root of the problem at all, or how to even start figuring out if the problem is due to Makefile, or the script to build or something else entirely?
